title: [GAMEPLAY] Weird Thresh Soul Interaction
body:
I can't get a video of this because I can't record my games reliably, but recently with Thresh I've been *sometimes* getting souls even when I or my lantern are far away from the soul in question.

I can't explain how to reproduce this, but it seems to happen pretty frequently.

Has anyone else been experiencing this?

replies.body: Ya it's a visual bug where any souls that are out will *appear* to be gathered when they time out, but they don't actually give them to you. Just check your stacks next time and you'll verify it doesn't change.
Yup, this is the case. We're aware of the issue. :]

Same yeah. I don't play him often, but I do distinctly remember one time recently hearing the "soul collected" sound effect while i was shopping in the fountain. Clicked out just in time to see it flying into me.

yeah I haven't gotten enough games in with him to know if there is a pattern to it, but I know there are times where souls seem to always come to me if they've spawned, and other times when I am like trying to move towards them to collect them but I'm zoned so I can't get less that like 400 or 500  space I guess to them, and I just never collect them...

(also I've always been bugged by the fact that he counts each soul once, but when they die it looks like there are like three there, xD thematically confusing much?)
